attributes.action: Ban Sale of Fireworks to the Public
attributes.additional_details:

RESTRICT FIREWORK NIGHT TO ONE DESIGNATED NIGHT OF THE YEAR (EITHER NOVEMBER 5TH OR THE NEAREST SATURDAY TO NOVEMBER 5TH).

ISN'T IT ABOUT TIME THEY WERE BANNED NOW ESPECIALLY WHEN THUGS GET HOLD OF THEM AND DELIBERATELY HORRIFICALLY INJURE HURT ANIMALS AND OTHER PEOPLE.

HOSPITALS ARE ON ALERT AT THIS TIME OF YEAR AND IT JUST ISN'T RIGHT OR JUSTIFIED ANY MORE.
